title: Boston 25
description:
The Boston 25 News app brings you news, weather, traffic, sports and more from Metro Boston, New Hampshire, all of New England and beyond. It's easy for you to find streaming video so you can watch our newscasts and/or breaking news coverage -- LIVE as it happens. You also get quick access to weather, traffic and today's top stories. We strive to provide you with the best local coverage, so watch for updates as we continue to improve your app experience.
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
Please note: This app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
description_html:
The Boston 25 News app brings you news, weather, traffic, sports and more from Metro Boston, New Hampshire, all of New England and beyond. It's easy for you to find streaming video so you can watch our newscasts and/or breaking news coverage -- LIVE as it happens. You also get quick access to weather, traffic and today's top stories. We strive to provide you with the best local coverage, so watch for updates as we continue to improve your app experience.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Please note: This app features Nielsen's proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen's TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
